column1: table 20.  Supplemental data for 49 large city governments
series title:  Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts 1998, NCJ 190641
data source:  Criminal Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts Program (CJEE)
Table 20.  Supplemental data for 49 large city governments
Note: Jurisdictions without data did not report for 1998.
a/ Population data are from the Bureau of the Census, July 1, 1998 Population Estimates for Places and Minor Civil Divisions.
b/ "Total general expenditure" excludes utilities, city-operated liquor stores, and insurance benefits.
c/ "General functions only" FTE excludes utilities and city-operated liquor stores.
